question:
Which of the following activities is / are carried out in the Integrated Power Development Scheme (IPDS)?
  1. Provide financial support to discoms to reduce their AT&C losses
  2. Distribute energy efficient LED lights at low prices to consumers
  3. Promote FDI in power generation in India
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Integrated Power Development (IPDS) scheme focuses on improvement of T&D networks across India and provides financial assitance to all discoms (including private discoms) and state power departments to help reduction of AT&C losses, establishment of IT enabled energy accounting / auditing system, improvement in billed energy based on metered consumption and improvement in collection efficiency.
